tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE vulnerability_assessments (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  assessment_date DATE,
  assessment_type VARCHAR(50),
  security_weakness VARCHAR(255),
  remediation_action TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE vulnerability_assessment (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	date DATE,
	severity VARCHAR(50),
	description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE regulations (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	name VARCHAR(100),
	description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE remediation (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	vulnerability_id INT,
	regulations_id INT,
	action_taken TEXT,
	date_completed DATE
)

CREATE TABLE vulnerability_assessments (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    assessment_date DATE,
    assessment_type VARCHAR(255),
    findings TEXT,
    remediation_plan TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE security_weaknesses (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    weakness_name VARCHAR(255),
    affected_system VARCHAR(255),
    severity_level VARCHAR(50),
    remediation_actions TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE remediation_history (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    remediation_date DATE,
    remediation_status VARCHAR(50),
    remediation_approver VARCHAR(255),
    notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE vulnerabilities (
    vulnerability_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vulnerability_name VARCHAR(255),
    vulnerability_description TEXT,
    severity_level INT
)

CREATE TABLE assessments (
    assessment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    assessment_date DATE,
    assessment_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE regulations (
    regulation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    regulation_name VARCHAR(100),
    regulation_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE remediations (
    remediation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    remediation_description TEXT,
    remediation_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE assessment_results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    assessment_id INT,
    vulnerability_id INT,
    result_details TEXT,
    remediation_id INT
)
